movies.title: The Story of the Other Wise Man
movies.plot: A wise man named Artaban follows an old prophecy concerning the stars and travels to Bethlehem to find the newly born King. When a stranger in need along the way distracts him from his course and he misses his chance to meet his Savior, he sets off on a long 30-year journey through Egypt and Jerusalem to find his Messiah and deliver Him his gifts.
movies.simplePlot: A wise man named Artaban follows an old prophecy concerning the stars and travels to Bethlehem to find the newly born King. When a stranger in need along the way distracts him from his ...

biography.bio: Peter Pacey was born in 1948 in England. He is an actor, known for Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989), The Iron Lady (2011) and Reckless: The Sequel (1998).
biography.name: Peter Pacey

biography.bio: Fraser Kerr was born on February 25, 1931 in Glasgow, Scotland. He was an actor, known for The Lord of the Rings (1978), The Story of the Other Wise Man (1989) and Blood Fiend (1967). He died on March 19, 2000 in London, England.
biography.name: Fraser Kerr

biography.bio: John Graham is an actor, known for Five Million Years to Earth (1967), The Story of the Other Wise Man (1989) and The First Night of 'Pygmalion' (1969).
biography.name: John Graham

biography.bio: Jonathan Kydd was born in 1956 in London, England. He is an actor and writer, known for Flushed Away (2006), Toy Story That Time Forgot (2014) and Dot the I (2003).
biography.name: Jonathan Kydd

biography.bio: Julie Peasgood was born on May 28, 1956 in Grimsby, Humberside, England. She is an actress and producer, known for House of the Long Shadows (1983), Hollyoaks (1995) and The Lake (1978). She has been married to Patrick Pearson since 1998. She was previously married to Dallas Smith and Peter McEnery.
biography.name: Julie Peasgood

biography.bio: Joe Searby is an actor, known for The Story of the Other Wise Man (1989), The Lords of Discipline (1983) and A Pattern of Roses (1983).
biography.name: Joe Searby

biography.bio: Robert Petersen is an actor, known for The Story of the Other Wise Man (1989).
biography.name: Robert Petersen

biography.bio: Cathrine Conner is an actress, known for The Story of the Other Wise Man (1989).
biography.name: Cathrine Conner

companyCreditsSimple.name: Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
